description: Short-term plans include infrastructure investment and reviewing the population management system.
title: Coronavirus: Guernsey's 'revive and thrive' economic recovery
title_page: Coronavirus: Guernsey's 'revive and thrive' economic recovery - BBC News
maintext: Deputy Trott said: "If we are not to waste those opportunities, we are going to need to be willing to be bold and brave and back our plans with investment."
